r.s: Net_FTP provides an OO interface to the PHP FTP functions plus some additions
r.d: Net_FTP allows you to communicate with FTP servers in a more comfortable way than the native FTP functions of PHP do. The class implements everything nativly supported by PHP and additionally features like recursive up- and downloading, dircreation and chmodding. It although implements an observer pattern to allow for example the view of a progress bar.
r.n:
This release ads new features and fixes all open bugs. Changelog: -----------
Fixes:
* Fixed bug #336: ftp_login displays Warning. * Fixed bug #813: ftp_nb_put function abort when mode is null. * Fixed bug #240: mkdir() with $recursive===true doesn't support "single" directories. * Fixed bug #723: Timeout for connect cannot be set. * Fixed bug #918: getRecursive() corrupts binary file. * Fixed typos.
Enhancements:
* Added site() method for usage of FTP SITE command. Thanks to Eivind Lie <nittereivind@ununique.net> for that. * Added funtionality for chmod on server and recursive chmod. Both currently support only numeric values. I'll try to fix this. Thanks to Eivind Lie <nittereivind@ununique.net> for this patch. * Now Windows ftp directories enabled. Thanks Eric Quilantang. * Added the observer pattern. Up- and downloads are now observable (this works e.g. for HTML_Progress). Thanks to Laurent Laville <larell@php.net>. * Added support for timout setting. * Added input validation for port and hostname.
